references.reason: This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the foundation upon which many of the methods in this paper are built.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper proposed progressive distillation, a technique used to accelerate diffusion models, which is a key component of several methods used in this paper.
This paper introduced Animatediff-lightning, a method to speed up video generation, directly compared to and built upon in this paper.
This paper introduced SDXL-lightning, a method for improving the quality of one-step generation, directly relevant to this paper's goals.

references.paper_title: Fast high-resolution image synthesis with latent adversarial diffusion distillation
references.reason: This paper introduced a method for fast, high-resolution image synthesis using adversarial distillation, a technique directly relevant and compared to in this paper.
